lead_paragraph: But some investors were disappointed at the pace of growth at the securities unit, the biggest contributor to Barclays’ earnings, and shares dropped in London on Friday.
snippet: But some investors were disappointed at the pace of growth at the securities unit, the biggest contributor to Barclays’ earnings, and shares dropped in London on Friday.

headline.main: Barclays Profit Is Up 29% in First Quarter
headline.seo: Barclays Profit Is Up 29% in First Quarter
headline.print_headline: Barclays Posts 29% Higher Profit as Bad Loans Subside
